sourcesContent:
<template>  

  <Navbar @toggle-menu = "handleToggleMenu"/>

  <router-view/>
  <navbar />
  <Footer/>

</template>

<script>
import Navbar from "./components/Navbar.vue"
import Footer from "./components/Footer.vue"
import Login from "./components/Login.vue";

export default {
  components: {
    Navbar,
    Footer,
    Login
  },
  methods:{
   handleToggleMenu(){
    this.$refs.navbar.toggleMenu();
   }
  }
}
</script>
<style>
*{
  /* background: #EAEAEA; */
  font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif;
  font-size: small;
  
}
.Footer {
  position: fixed;
  left: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
}



</style>
